script.name: plugin.guilds.docktend.std
script.sourceplaintext:
$page.id = get global variable: name='pageid.guilds'
[THIS] ->set command: COMMAND_SHIP_DOCKTENDER $table.noroute = table alloc $last.reset = playing time
while [HOMEBASE] -> exists $current.time = playing time if $current.time > ( $last.reset + 1200 ) $last.reset = playing time $table.noroute = table alloc end
@ = wait randomly from 10000 to 15000 ms gosub sub.FindMaxPrio gosub sub.GetNextTask end
return null
* ==================================== * ====================================
* ==================================== sub.FindMaxPrio: $max.prio = 1 $table = $a.data['buy.wares'] gosub sub.FindMaxPrioFromTable $table = $a.data['sell.wares'] gosub sub.FindMaxPrioFromTable endsub
* ==================================== sub.FindMaxPrioFromTable: if $table $s.key = get next key: table=$table key=null while $s.key $prio = $table[$s.key][1] do if $prio > $max.prio $max.prio = $prio $s.key = get next key: table=$table key=$s.key end end endsub
* ==================================== sub.GetNextTask: $prio = 0 while $prio < $max.prio @ = wait 50 ms inc $prio =
* We should first to sell ware that we have enoguh off $table = $a.data['sell.wares'] if $table $is.buy = [FALSE] $ware = get next key: table=$table key=null $table.valid = table alloc while $ware $data.array = $table[$ware] $value = $data.array[1] if $value == $prio gosub sub.IsValidSellTask do if $is.valid $table.valid[$ware] = $data.array end $ware = get next key: table=$table key=$ware end
if size of table $table.valid gosub sub.FindDestination if $task gosub sub.StartTask endsub end end end
* Next we should check if we have anything to buy $is.buy = [TRUE] $table = $a.data['buy.wares'] if $table $ware = get next key: table=$table key=null $table.valid = table alloc while $ware $data.array = $table[$ware] $value = $data.array[1] if $value == $prio gosub sub.IsValidBuyTask do if $is.valid $table.valid[$ware] = $data.array end $ware = get next key: table=$table key=$ware end
if size of table $table.valid gosub sub.FindDestination if $task gosub sub.StartTask endsub end end end end
if [DOCKEDAT] != [HOMEBASE] gosub sub.Resupply @ = [THIS] -> call script !ship.cmd.returnhome.std : end endsub
* ==================================== sub.FindDestination: @ $task = [THIS] -> call script lib.guilds.docktend.getdest : Valid Data Table=$table.valid Is Buying?=$is.buy Blacklist Table=null Only Sats=[FALSE] No Route Table=$table.noroute endsub
* ==================================== sub.Resupply: @ = [THIS] -> call script lib.guilds.resupply : Destination=$destination Only Docked=[FALSE] endsub
* ==================================== sub.StartTask: $ware = $task[0] $destination = $task[1] $data.array = $table.valid[$ware] if not $is.buy if [DOCKEDAT] != [HOMEBASE] $amt = [THIS] -> get free amount of ware $ware in cargo bay $ware.station.amt = [HOMEBASE] -> get amount of ware $ware in cargo bay $station.min = $data.array[4] $ware.station.amt = $ware.station.amt - $station.min $amt = get minimum, $amt, $ware.station.amt, null, null, null $amt = convert number $amt to string $read.text = sprintf: pageid=$page.id textid=4027, $ware, $amt, null, null, null [THIS] ->set command extra display override: text=$read.text gosub sub.ReturnHome @ = wait randomly from 1000 to 5000 ms end
$destination = $task[1] @ = [THIS] -> call script lib.guilds.resupply : Destination=$destination Only Docked=[TRUE] $amt = [THIS] -> get free amount of ware $ware in cargo bay $ware.station.amt = [HOMEBASE] -> get amount of ware $ware in cargo bay
$station.min = $data.array[4] $ware.station.amt = $ware.station.amt - $station.min
if [THIS] -> get amount of ware Navigation Command Software MK1 in cargo bay if [THIS] -> get amount of ware Jumpdrive in cargo bay if not [THIS] -> get amount of ware Advanced Jumpdrive in cargo bay if not [THIS] -> get amount of ware Jumpdrive Energy Generator in cargo bay if [THIS] -> is autojump activated $dest.sector = $destination -> get sector $jumps = get jumps from sector [SECTOR] to sector $dest.sector $jumps = ( $jumps + 1 ) * 2 $energy.needed = [THIS] ->get needed jump energy: jumps=$jumps $energy.resupply = [THIS] -> get jumpdrive fuel resupply if $energy.resupply $energy.resupply = [THIS] ->get needed jump energy: jumps=$energy.resupply $energy.needed = get maximum, $energy.needed, $energy.resupply, null, null, null end $energy.got = [THIS] -> get amount of ware Energy Cells in cargo bay $energy.needed = $energy.needed - $energy.got $energy.vol = get volume of ware Energy Cells $energy.needed = $energy.needed * $energy.vol $cargo.free = [THIS] -> get free volume of cargo bay $cargo.free = $cargo.free - $energy.needed $ware.vol = get volume of ware $ware $amt = $cargo.free / $ware.vol end end end end end
$amt = get minimum, $amt, $ware.station.amt, null, null, null = [THIS] ->load $amt units of $ware, ignore minimum=[TRUE] $text = convert number $amt to string $read.text = sprintf: pageid=6020 textid=2083, $ware, $text, null, null, null [THIS] ->set command extra display override: text=$read.text else $ware.station.amt = [HOMEBASE] -> get amount of ware $ware in cargo bay $station.max = $data.array[4] $station.need = $station.max - $ware.station.amt $amt = [THIS] -> get free amount of ware $ware in cargo bay $amt = get minimum, $amt, $station.need, null, null, null $text = convert number $amt to string $read.text = sprintf: pageid=6020 textid=2082, $ware, $text, null, null, null [THIS] ->set command extra display override: text=$read.text end
gosub sub.Resupply gosub sub.MoveTo @ = wait 500 ms if [DOCKEDAT] == $destination $price = $data.array[3] $station.price = [DOCKEDAT] -> get price of ware $ware if $is.buy if $station.price <= $price $station.max = $data.array[4] $station.amt = [HOMEBASE] -> get amount of ware $ware in cargo bay $station.need = $station.max - $station.amt $ship.amt = [THIS] -> get free amount of ware $ware in cargo bay $amt = get minimum, $station.need, $ship.amt, null, null, null if $amt > 0 = [THIS] -> buy $amt units of $ware to a max. price of $price Cr end end else if $station.price >= $price $ship.got = [THIS] -> get true amount of ware $ware in cargo bay if $ware == Energy Cells $home.sector = [HOMEBASE] -> get sector $energy.needed = [THIS] -> needed jump drive energy for jump to sector $home.sector $ship.got = $ship.got - $energy.needed end $sold = [THIS] -> sell $ship.got units of $ware end end end
@ = wait randomly from 1000 to 5000 ms gosub sub.Resupply gosub sub.ReturnHome [THIS] ->set command extra display override: text=null endsub
* ==================================== sub.StripWares: if [DOCKEDAT] == [HOMEBASE] $tTradeables = [HOMEBASE] ->get station tradeable ware table if $tTradeables $key = get next key: table=$tTradeables key=null while $key $ship.amt = [THIS] -> get true amount of ware $key in cargo bay do if $ship.amt > 0 = [THIS] -> unload $ship.amt units of $key $key = get next key: table=$tTradeables key=$key end end end endsub
* ==================================== sub.ReturnHome: $destination = [HOMEBASE] gosub sub.Resupply gosub sub.MoveTo if [DOCKEDAT] != [HOMEBASE] $ship.name = [THIS] -> get name $ship.name = strip colour codes: $ship.name $home.sector = [HOMEBASE] -> get sector $home.name = [HOMEBASE] -> get name $read.text = sprintf: pageid=$page.id textid=4028, $ship.name, $home.name, $home.sector, null, null send incoming message $read.text to player: type:[Log.Alert], display it=[FALSE], log it=[TRUE] return null end gosub sub.StripWares endsub
* ==================================== sub.MoveTo: [THIS] ->set destination to $destination if [THIS] -> get amount of ware Advanced Jumpdrive in cargo bay @ = [THIS] -> call script plugin.advjump.jump : Jump Target=$destination else if [THIS] -> get amount of ware Jumpdrive Energy Generator in cargo bay if [THIS] -> get amount of ware Jumpdrive in cargo bay @ = [THIS] -> call script plugin.advjump.jump : Jump Target=$destination end end
while [DOCKEDAT] != $destination @ = wait 10 ms @ $ret = [THIS] -> call script !move.movetostation : station=$destination if $ret == FLRET_NOPATH $dest.sector = $destination -> get sector $home.sector = [HOMEBASE] -> get sector skip if $dest.sector == $home.sector $table.noroute[$dest.sector] = [TRUE] break end end [THIS] ->set destination to null endsub
* ==================================== * Check we have enough wares availble to fill the ship quota sub.IsValidSellTask: $is.valid = [FALSE] $ware.station.amt = [HOMEBASE] -> get amount of ware $ware in cargo bay $ship.min = $data.array[5] $ship.min = ( $ship.min + 1 ) * 5 $ship.free = [THIS] -> get free amount of ware $ware in cargo bay $ship.min = fixed multiply and divide: $ship.free * $ship.min / 100 $station.min = $data.array[4] $ware.station.amt = $ware.station.amt - $station.min if $ware.station.amt >= $ship.min $is.valid = [TRUE] end endsub
* ==================================== sub.IsValidBuyTask: $is.valid = [FALSE] $ware.station.amt = [HOMEBASE] -> get amount of ware $ware in cargo bay $price = $data.array[3] $station.money = [HOMEBASE] -> get money $ship.min = $data.array[5] $ship.min = ( $ship.min + 1 ) * 5 $ship.free = [THIS] -> get free amount of ware $ware in cargo bay $ship.min = fixed multiply and divide: $ship.free * $ship.min / 100 $money = $ship.min * $price if $station.money > $money $station.max = $data.array[4] $station.need = $station.max - $ware.station.amt if $station.need >= $ship.min $is.valid = [TRUE] end end endsub
return null

comment.var: We should first to sell ware that we have enoguh off
Next we should check if we have anything to buy

line.text: set command extra display override: text=
get free volume of cargo bay
set command extra display override: text=
set command extra display override: text=
needed jump drive energy for jump to sector
set command extra display override: text=

comment.var: Check we have enough wares availble to fill the ship quota

sval.val: We should first to sell ware that we have enoguh off
Next we should check if we have anything to buy
Check we have enough wares availble to fill the ship quota
